Diffie-Hellman

Theory

  • Symmetric key exchange algorithm.

Algorithm

+-------+       |                          |       +-------+
| Alice |       |                          |       |  Bob  |
+-------+       |                          |       +-------+
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PRIVATE NUMBER  | LARGE PRIME NUMBER       | PRIVATE NUMBER
a=4             | x=23                     | b=3
                | PRIMITIVE ROOT MODULO x  |
                | y=5                      |
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
PRIVATE FORMULA |                          | PRIVATE FORMULA
A=y^a%x         |                          | B=y^b%x
A=5^4%23        |                          | B=5^3%23
A=625%23        |                          | B=125%23
A=4             |                          | B=10
                | --------- A=4  --------> |
                | <-------- B=10 --------- |
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
KEY FORMULA     |                          | KEY FORMULA
K=B^a%x         |                          | K=A^b%x
K=10^4%23       |                          | K=4^3%23
K=10000%23      |                          | K=64%23
K=18            |                          | K=18
